query:
UPDATE user_progress up
JOIN (
  SELECT DISTINCT qp.topicId 
  FROM question_progress qp 
  JOIN topics t ON qp.topicId = t.id
  WHERE qp.userId = 7 AND t.courseId = 30002 
    AND qp.firstAttemptStatus IN ('correct', 'incorrect')
) answered ON up.topicId = answered.topicId
SET up.status = 'completed'
WHERE up.userId = 7 AND up.courseId = 30002;

UPDATE user_progress up
SET up.status = 'in_progress'
WHERE up.userId = 7 AND up.courseId = 30002
  AND up.topicId NOT IN (
    SELECT DISTINCT qp.topicId 
    FROM question_progress qp 
    WHERE qp.userId = 7 AND qp.firstAttemptStatus IN ('correct', 'incorrect')
  );
